section.title: Diameter Rule engine application plugin overview
section.p: The Diameter Rule Engine application plugin is supported to enable the handling of generic message manipulation scenarios. section.title: Rule profile (Diameter rule system version)
section.p: A rule system version captures a series of triggers and associated rule groups. The SM supports a graphical drag-and-drop interface with an embedded text editor for creating rules.

sectiondiv.p: In the Edit Rule System Version window, enter information as shown in the following table.

entry.p: Enter a name for the Rule System Version.

row.entry: Specify a description of the profile.

entry.p: Specifies the user types that can see the RSV records.
If no value is specified, the RSV is public.

row.entry: Select a trigger to define one or more associations between triggers and rule groups.

Select a rule group or add a rule group to define one or more associations between triggers and rule groups. The selection opens an Edit Rule Group panel that allows you to provide a name for the rule group, state if the rule group is a top level rule group, and define the rules in the rule group.
